amendment.description: To provide for improved medical readiness of the members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3163 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3163 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To provide for improved medical readiness of the members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3163 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3163 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton.
